data.description:
PilotWatch is a watchapp dedicated to pilots doing dead reckoning navigation.
It requires no preparation. Just run the app when on board. It is the perfect companion for your navigation log.
Set the flight duration directly on the watch then start your flight.
PilotWatch records the start time.
Set the estimated leg duration on the watch directly at each turning point.
PilotWatch gives you instantly the estimated leg end time, the difference between the estimated and actual duration for the past leg.
PilotWatch will always warn you if you're approaching the end of your flight or if you've exceeded your estimated leg duration.
Finally end your flight.
PilotWatch gives you the total actual flight time, the end time and the difference between the estimate and actual flight duration.
All data is on the screen. No pages.
Colors help you identify quickly the time data.
